main event: On 26 December 1949, a routine training mission aircraft was approached by an unidentified object traveling at a speed of approximately 600 miles per hour. The object was detected on radar but was not visually sighted.
interesting points: The incident occurred 500 miles SE of Newfoundland at coordinates 14째 45' N 60째 47' W.
The unidentified object approached the aircraft from the rear and faded from view after the aircraft executed a 900 turn.
The target was detected on the APQ-13 radar set, indicating that it was not a visual anomaly but a real object in the airspace.
The report was originally classified as 'TOP SECRET' and marked with security information 'R2C'.
The document was declassified after 12 years according to a Department of Defense directive.
location: 500 mi. SE of Newfoundland, coordinates 14째 45' N 60째 47' W
witnesses: Major Norman N. Ferlifer, 23rd Strategic Recon Sq., Photo Thule
